TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContractSearchPattern extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern

Docs.summary: Obtains the file locations and descriptions of ASP.NET Web services. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ContractSearchPattern class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document. Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference GetDiscoveryReference(string filename) cil managed

Docs.param: The file-system path of the Web service's .asmx file.
Docs.summary: Creates the object for the specified .asmx file.
Docs.returns: A object with the specified file name for its .asmx file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.
A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> instance contains the location of the .asmx file and the corresponding Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, which can be dynamically obtained by appending a wsdl query string to the .asmx file path.

Docs.summary: Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The pattern "*.asmx" indicates an ASP.NET Web service file extension.
